metadata.title: CVE-2023-26151 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Versions of the package asyncua before 0.9.96 are vulnerable to Denial ofService (DoS) such that an attacker can send a malformed packet and as aresult, the server will enter into an infinite loop and consume excessivememory.

criterions.comment: python-opcua package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
